root.name: Sonic Drift
root.description: OverviewSonic Drift is a Sonic go-kart racing game for the Sega Game Gear. It offers four playable characters. They are Sonic, Doctor Robotnik, Tails, and Amy. Sonic Drift is the first game where Amy appeared. Sonic Drift had six tracks and three different tournaments, offering 18 levels in total. Sonic Drift has appeared in a number of sonic game collections. It was offered as an unlockable Game Gear Game in Sonic Adventure DX, and it was also playable in Sega Mega Collection Plus. Â Plot Dr. Robotnik has once again stolen the chaos emeralds, and it is up to Sonic and his friends to get them back. In order to do so they must compete in a series of racing tournaments against Dr. Robotnik.
